programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A scientist is overjoyed when his son follows in his footsteps, receiving widespread acclaim for a revolutionary new theory. When a fellow boffin produces evidence of plagiarism, the ruthless father resorts to murder to save his son from a scandal. But he reckons without the dishevelled detective, who sees through his efforts to make the killing look like the work of burglars. Crime drama, with Peter Falk, Jose Ferrer and Lew Ayres

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The owner of an American football team is found dead in a swimming pool, and his drowning is regarded as an accident. The down-at-heel detective is convinced that foul play was involved and sets out to prove his case - but his chief suspect has a cast-iron alibi that places him miles away from the scene of the crime. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk and Robert Culp

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A penniless rare-plant collector, desperate for funds to support his expensive hobby, fakes his nephew's kidnapping to get his hands on a trust fund. However, the supposed victim turns up dead, prompting Columbo to take action to unmask the killer. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Bradford Dillman and Ray Milland

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A millionaire art collector is thought to have been killed as the result of a random burglary. However, Columbo is convinced the dead man's nephew committed the crime to avoid being written out of the will, and embarks on a mission to ensnare his suspect. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Ross Martin and Don Ameche

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A TV executive's assistant responds to being denied a promotion by killing her boss, then uses her years of experience working on detective shows to create the perfect cover-up. But she reckons without the intervention of Columbo, who begins laying his trap for her while also nursing a neck injury. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk and Trish Van Devere

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A terrorist posing as an Irish author heads a peace organization while secretly running guns for the IRA in Belfast. When he kills an arms dealer who tried to swindle him, the writer is sure he has covered his tracks - until Columbo shambles on to the scene. Detective drama, with Peter Falk, Clive Revill, Jeanette Nolan and Bernard Behrens

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A sex therapist tries to pin the blame for the murder of her unfaithful lover on her assistant, but the dishevelled detective is not convinced by the ruse and seeks to identify a mysterious woman in black who was spotted leaving the scene of the crime. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Lindsay Crouse, Peter Jurasik and Julia Montgomery

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In an effort to find the terrorist Parsa, Gibbs and the NCIS team track down one of his cohorts using evidence gleaned from the drone attack which has killed six people and wounded a further 22. Meanwhile, an emotionally shaken McGee struggles with the ramifications of the incident. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU team is called in after a teenage exchange student is assaulted by a taxi driver. Drama, starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU team investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist. Meanwhile, Fin's family ties to a suspect take him off the case. Mariska Hargitay, Kelli Giddish and Ice-T star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee deals with his father's recent death by writing him a letter outlining the details of his latest investigation. The case involved tracking down a hactivist collective known as Krampus, who were thought to have been responsible for an incident in which the internet crashed all over Washington, DC. McGee and Abby brought in three known cyber-terrorists for questioning, and discover evidence that links the trio to an attempted breach of the Congress e-mail server and archive. However, when this line of inquiry reaches a dead-end, the team picks up a new lead that suggests an isolated hacker from Wisconsin may be responsible. This 'lone wolf' scenario does not seem plausible to McGee, though, as he recalls a lesson his late father taught him. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The bodies of five people, all of whom are identified as being from the US Navy, are found on the floor of a diner, and all are connected to a suspicious tax firm that specialises in helping people who are in arrears. When further killings are linked to the business, the team realises the crime seem to be copycats of previous cases. Meanwhile, two of Gibbs' ex-wives appear at the location with something important to discuss with the agent. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives probe the shooting of a motorist, and arrest a man who helped the victim change a tyre on his car shortly before he was killed. The suspect protests his innocence, and points the investigators in the direction of another man who admits to the crime and even signs a confession, but further inquiries cast doubt on his guilt. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a book editor who was reputedly having an affair with one of her authors, and find themselves focusing on the lover's long-time companion, whose alibi turns out to be a tissue of lies. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV is helping to bring criminals using weapons to justice. A CCTV operator's instincts lead him to keep an eye on a man acting suspiciously on a train station platform and who then takes a knife out of his pocket and threatens a woman coming towards him. There is also footage of a raid on a west London jewellery shop, with the gang spraying bleach in the eyes of security guards and smashing down the doors with pickaxes while the terrified staff cower inside

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A model dies while filming a reality TV show at a US Marine base, and an autopsy reveals she was killed by a drug overdose administered by someone else. Inquiries lead the team to identify three possible suspects - but one of them is also murdered. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Lauren Holly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony and Ziva disappear while searching for smuggled weapons at a shipyard. Gibbs is soon on the case and learns the pair were looking for a freight container thought to hold explosives from Iraq. McGee tries to get a GPS trace on the missing duo's mobiles, leaving the others struggling to find them before they come to serious harm. Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A commander who knows the location of a shipment of nuclear fuel rods is abducted, and the team is called in to try to identify the kidnapper. However, as the investigation turns up new evidence, it appears someone might have had a very different motive for silencing the officer. Guest starring Zac Efron

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A reporter accused of causing the deaths of US soldiers in Iraq by revealing confidential information is shot and wounded in New York. The team discovers the gun belonged to one of the dead servicemen, and suspicion soon falls on a disgruntled colleague of the deceased

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green are called to investigate the murder of a grief counsellor who claimed he could communicate with the dead, and discover he was a conman with a host of disgruntled clients, any one of whom might have had a motive for killing him. Crime drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A sweatshop boss is killed in what initially appears to be a violent but fairly routine crime prompted by a workplace affair. Briscoe and Green begin their investigation by working on the assumption that they are looking for a wronged partner with a grievance - but inquiries gradually lead them to an illegal immigrant who claims the dead man had coerced his partner into acting as a surrogate mother

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The suspicious death of a rich Iranian caviar importer the day after his wedding leads the detectives to a string of suspects, including his wife and his chief competitor in the industry. However, new light is thrown on the investigation by the discovery that the murder weapon was a pillow belonging to the businessman's daughter

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Jerry Orbach's final appearance in the crime drama. Briscoe's investigation into the killing of a delivery man uncovers the married victim's involvement in a website arranging romantic liaisons between consenting adults, and reveals the deceased's wife had recently purchased a gun

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A carjacking turns nasty when an off-duty police officer is killed and the driver is kidnapped. Luckily, Briscoe and Curtis capture one of the perpetrators, who offers to reveal the whereabouts of the missing driver to DA Ross - in exchange for immunity on the cop-killing charge. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a lance corporal, whose body has been found in an empty house, and discovers he had a number of spurned lovers and a $2million inheritance. Ducky and Gibbs interview one of the dead marine's partners, but disagree over whether she is telling the truth. David McCallum and Mark Harmon star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Kidnappers strike on Halloween, wounding a marine sergeant and snatching his daughter - leaving the team members wondering why anyone would try to extort money from someone on such a modest salary. As the agents begin searching for a motive, Abby surprises everyone by turning up at the lab in a revealing fancy-dress costume

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team joins forces with military investigators to ascertain whether terrorists were responsible for an explosion at a golf course in which a marine colonel was killed. As inquiries proceed, McGee has to use his computer skills to break into secret government files to ensure the murderers are apprehended. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Red and Liz run into danger as they begin a frantic search for Andras Halmi, a close advisor of the Director who has suddenly vanished. While hunting for the one man he thinks is capable of clearing Liz's name, Tom finds himself in a bloodthirsty fight club

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for two suspects spotted fleeing the scene after a Muslim woman is assaulted inside a synagogue. Meanwhile, Benson is dismayed to find Rob Miller out on bail. Mariska Hargitay stars

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death of a teenage girl found dead in the Hudson River, but cannot prove it. Despite having only circumstantial evidence, ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives. Mariska Hargitay stars

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and his colleagues investigate when Eric Kutzler, the first openly gay Navy lieutenant tipped to receive the Medal of Honour, is murdered. While the agents initially suspect Kutzler's death was the result of a hate crime, the fact that his police officer husband waited 20 minutes to report the crime suggests he had something to hide. Meanwhile, the team throws a baby shower for Palmer as his wife's due date approaches. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a model and discover splashes of blood that obviously did not come from the victim, but suggest the culprit is a relative. With Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis discover a man leading a secret double life when they investigate who opened fire on a group of people disembarking from a party cruise. programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: London's Weekend
programme.desc: A chance to catch up on the week's headlines and a taste of what to see and do in London this weekend.

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Documentary following life at Ireland's first purpose-built veterinary clinic that caters exclusively for cats. Nestled in the leafy environs of Glanmire in Co Cork, il is run by veterinary specialist Clare Meade who, together with her dedicated team, offers highly specialised care to the feline clientele

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: Top Tens of Warfare
programme.desc: The documentary explores how war has proven that necessity is the mother of invention, with Penicillin, plastic surgery and even the internet having origins in times of conflict

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Number Six is subjected to experimental drugs that enable his captors to manipulate his dreams in an attempt to discover why he resigned. Cult drama, starring Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: A stray cat wearing a cone-shaped collar turns out to be living a double life. A highly spirited cat called Charlie gets his annual check-up and a sphynx cat called Vader is treated for painful spots on his tummy

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert explores the South Downs, starting from Beachy Head, and examines some of the 39 species of butterfly recorded as using its chalk downlands as a habitat, including the Adonis blue. He also visits the supposedly haunted yew woodland at Kingley Vale nature reserve in West Sussex and comes across peregrine falcons and badgers

programme.title: Seize the Day (1986)
programme.desc: An honest salesman fallen on hard times return to his New York roots and a reunion with his estranged father. Drama, starring Robin Williams and Glenne Headly

programme.title: Terry on the Fence (1986)
programme.desc: A teenage runaway becomes involved with a tough street gang while trying to find a way to redeem himself. Crime drama, starring Jack McNicoll and Neville Watson

programme.title: Hobson's Choice (1953)
programme.desc: A cantankerous, overbearing boot-maker spends most of his time drinking while his three daughters push themselves to the limit taking care of his shop and home. A timid employee marries one of the sisters, then sets himself up as a rival for his business. Comedy, starring John Mills and Charles Laughton

programme.title: Odd Man Out (1947)
programme.desc: An IRA operative stages a robbery to steal funds for his cause, but as he makes his getaway he is wounded by the police and forced to go on the run. Staggering through the backstreets of Belfast, the fugitive encounters a succession of people either willing to help him - or determined to turn him in. Carol Reed's thriller, based on the book by FL Green, with James Mason, Robert Newton and Kathleen Ryan

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: The Lion Queen
programme.desc: Andi struggles to recover from having to sell four lions. A scientist reveals the results of a recent study into wild lion genetics which forces Andi to question whether she's doing the right thing at Glen Garriff

programme.title: Screen Two
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, starring Lynn Redgrave as a mother who took on the British legal establishment when no prosecutions followed the drug-related unlawful killing of her son

programme.title: Forget Me Not (2011)
programme.desc: A musician comes to the aid of a barmaid being accosted by a drunk. Together they go on a journey around London and begin to fall in love, but as the night draws to a close, a secret threatens to bring their fledgling relationship to an end before it has begun. Romantic drama, with Tobias Menzies and Genevieve O'Reilly

programme.title: Cul-de-Sac (1966)
programme.desc: Two wounded gangsters terrorise a middle-aged recluse and his wife in their secluded island retreat. Roman Polanski's macabre comedy, starring Donald Pleasence, Lionel Stander, Francoise Dorleac, Jack MacGowran and Jacqueline Bisset

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing Poplar for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days.

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: 'Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital.

programme.title: London's Weekend
programme.desc: A chance to catch up on the week's headlines and a taste of what to see and do in London this weekend.

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Ali and Siobhan travel to Clare Meade's clinic from Kerry with their cat Hope, which is suffering from multiple ongoing issues due to neurological disorder Cerebellar Hypoplasia - also known as wobbly cat syndrome. A tabby is brought in by owners Eleanor and Anna from Lismore in Waterford as the cat is in severe pain and is unable to urinate

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: Europe's Wilderness
programme.desc: A journey of discovery to a wonderful world of breath-taking views and endangered species with each episode focusing on one animal and its lifestyle, needs and habitat

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton crosses the great natural harbour of Scapa Flow to the island of Flotta, before heading round the main Island of Orkney to Stronsay and on to the stunning beaches of Sanday. Along the way, he hears stories of the First World War, a mysterious beast and Orkney's selkies

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton embarks on his most difficult journey to date as every destination has been long abandoned by people, meaning there are no ferries, piers or proper landing stages. He visits the once-inhabited island of Heisgeir, sails around the gannet haven of Sula Sgeir and endures rough seas to make landfall on the extraordinarily remote island of North Rona

programme.title: Candlelight in Algeria (1944)
programme.desc: An American sculptor living in London during the Second World War comes to the aid of a British secret agent whose life is in danger. The spy is on a mission to recover a camera containing evidence of vital Allied battle plans, but a Nazi operative is on his trail. Spy thriller, starring James Mason and Carla Lehmann

programme.title: Woman in a Dressing Gown (1957)
programme.desc: A man grows tired of his marriage and asks his wife for a divorce so he can marry his lover - but begins to regret abandoning his family. Drama, with Anthony Quayle and Sylvia Syms

programme.title: Lost in the Stars (1974)
programme.desc: A black South African minister searching the unfamiliar back alleys and shantytowns of Johannesburg for his missing son. Musical drama, starring Brock Peters and Melba Moore

programme.title: Tomorrow We Live (1943)
programme.desc: The mayor of a small town in occupied France collaborates with the Nazis, but does not realise his daughter is working with the Resistance. She offers shelter to an idealistic fugitive travelling without identification papers, who helps the rebels with smuggling Allied airmen into Britain. Second World War adventure, starring John Clements and Greta Gynt

programme.title: Tabernacle Choir: Music and Words
programme.desc: Music and inspiration for everyday living from one of the world's most acclaimed choirs featuring regular guest artists

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: The Dorcans, a powerful alien race, demand the Alphans hand Maya over to them. Last ever episode of the sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau and Patrick Troughton

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: On the way to a party at an air base, the team's car crashes and Steed is knocked out. Upon regaining consciousness, however, it appears he has gone back in time. Starring Patrick Macnee and Diana Rigg

programme.title: When Missing Turns to Murder
programme.desc: Series in which families reveal the moment their lives changed forever - when they were told their missing loved ones had been murdered

programme.title: Listen (2020)
programme.desc: In the London suburbs, Portuguese-born Bela and Jota face serious difficulties when social services raise concerns about the safety of their three children. Their seven-year-old daughter's deafness triggers a process in the system that seems to go on forever. Drama, starring L√∫cia Moniz and Sophia Myles

programme.title: Poor Cow (1967)
programme.desc: A young mother lives in squalor with her good-for-nothing husband. Kitchen-sink drama directed by Ken Loach, starring Carol White and Terence Stamp

programme.title: Screen Two
programme.desc: A farmer discovers his animals are dying of a mysterious disease after the water supply is poisoned - a contamination that could start to affect humans. With Warren Clarke

programme.title: Honour (2014)
programme.desc: A Muslim girl is forbidden from seeing her boyfriend by her traditional parents, but she defies them and the couple run away together. The girl's mother feels the family has been dishonoured, and hires a mysterious bounty hunter to track her down and carry out punishment for her disobedience. Thriller, starring Paddy Considine and Aiysha Hart

programme.title: Song for a Raggy Boy (2003)
programme.desc: A widower is hired to teach at a strict Catholic reformatory school, but the harsh regime soon fires his anger, leading to a series of confrontations with the heavy-handed priests in charge of the establishment. Fact-based drama set in 1939, starring Aidan Quinn, Iain Glen, Marc Warren and Dudley Sutton

programme.title: Big Boys Don't Cry (2020)
programme.desc: A man recalls his harrowing childhood growing up in a children's home following a police investigation into his boyhood friend's suicide. Drama, starring Michael Socha

programme.desc: A substitute teacher drifts from school to school, actively trying to avoid making emotional connections with either colleagues or pupils. Drama, starring Adrien Brody, Marcia Gay Harden and James Caan

programme.title: Live US Open Tennis
programme.desc: Live coverage of day one from Billie Jean King National Tennis Centre at Flushing Meadows in New York, featuring matches in the first round. Danil Medvedev got his defence of the title under way at this stage last year with a 6-2, 6-4, 6-0 victory over Stefan Kozlov, and 2012 champion Andy Murray also prevailed in straight sets against Francisco Cerundolo. In the women's competition, six time champion Serena Williams overcame Danka Kovinic and another home favourite 22 years Williams' junior in Coco Gauff also progressed comfortably against Leolia Jeanjean
